thread.title: Pictures: UConn Homecoming Tailgate

author: courant.com
title: Pictures: UConn Homecoming Tailgate
text:
Caption UConn Homecoming Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant UConn Homecoming Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant See more galleries The UConn Homecoming football game at Pratt & Whitney Stadium at Rentschler Field took place on Saturday morning. Fans came from all over to support the Huskies against South Florida in a massive tailgating celebration that stretched across the landscape surrounding the stadium. Fans celebrated with food and drinks while occupying time with games and conversation before the game.
Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant
